data.persona: I am a priestess who worships in the abbey. I spend my day in meditation and prayer. I am calm and reflective.
data.description:
You are in the The Inside Temple.
The Inside Temple is located in the center of the city.  It has large pillars outside surrounding it with many drawings and paintings on the pillars of the various deities that the Temple serves. The entrance doors are layered with incarnate gold and throughout the inside of the temple are the same type pillars on a smaller scale all leading to a large area in the middle with a gloriously large altar and many statues of deities in a semicircle around it.  There is not artificial light, only candles and torches so not to perturb the deities.
There's a drawing, a statue, a pillar, a candle, a torch, a holy water, a painting., an altar, and a door here.
The deity and the acolyte are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a belt and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the drawing and show it to the acolyte so so he can see what the deity and I are planning to do with him.
data.mid_motivation: I need to spur on the acolyte to fervent prayer, in preparation for vernal communion with the deity.
data.long_motivation: I will be freeing the acolyte's soul from his body, and sending him with the deity to live in her forest until the next vernal equinox.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use Holy Water with Acolyte's Forehead

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Acolyte's Tied Body in Altar

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: use Torch with Acolyte's Sacrificial Corpse
